Title: Family planning, change customs, the country is rich, the people are strong, the family is happy
Designer: Wu Shihua (吳世华)Yu Yuanjin (余园金)
Publisher: Jiangxi sheng jihua shengyu bangongshi (江西省計划生育办公室)
Notes: A family with two children. The poster looks post-Cultural Revolution, but must be before the implementation of the One-child policy (1979).
